title: Staying Dirty
description: “What I did today… I don’t want to be that person anymore. I don’t know how you can stand to touch me."“I’ll never stop wanting to touch you, Link. I’m pretty sure you’re the only one I want to touch for the rest of my life.”Link and Rocky's story concludes in this fifth and final installment of the Dirty series.*This is part five in a five-part novella series.**Due to sexual situations and violence, this series is recommended for 18+.
author: Cheryl McIntyre
